meanings.definition: A large, ground-dwelling bird native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The carassows roamed freely in the lush forests.
meanings.sent2: We spotted a group of carassows during our nature hike.
meanings.sent3: The carassows had a party in the clearing, chirping happily.
meanings.sent4: The carassows stood tall like guardians of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The colorful carassows were a sight to behold in the wild.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'carassow', referring to multiple individuals of the species.
meanings.sent1: Many carassows gathered near the riverbank.
meanings.sent2: The carassows' feathers glistened under the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: A flock of carassows strutted around, showing off their beauty.
meanings.sent4: The carassows moved gracefully in unison, a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The chirping of the carassows filled the air with music.
